tweet.text: NSPG 189, May 17, 1988: “Secretary Shultz said that the Summit would focus on the four part agenda. He added that the Summit should be seen not as a climax, but as a second wind in U.S.-Soviet relations, which should continue to develop.” https://t.co/xS4IT9CAOD #FRUS
tweet.html: NSPG 189, May 17, 1988: “Secretary Shultz said that the Summit would focus on the four part agenda. He added that the Summit should be seen not as a climax, but as a second wind in U.S.-Soviet relations, which should continue to develop.” buff.ly/2IVg7Kl #FRUS
